Description: Genuine Asher Electro Hawaiian Jnr Lap Steel - Solid Mahogany Neck Through Construction. High Grade Rosewood Board. Dual Asher Humbuckers. Hipshot Bridge. From the Lap Steel Guitar specialists who boast artists such as Ben Harper, Bonnie Raitt, Axl Rose, Beck, The Black Crowes, Tom Petty, Eagles, Lindsey Buckingham/Fleetwood Mac, Gary Clark Jnr, Jackson Brown, Deryck Whibley (Sum 41), T-Bone Burnett, John Frusciante & Flea (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Paul Simon, Jerry Cantrell (Alice in Chains), Robben Ford, Robby Kreiger (The Doors), Ry Cooder, Zac Brown and even Mr Steven Seagal on their clients list, just to name a few. The guitar is in immaculate condition and includes the original Asher gig bag. Bargain price and a rarity this side of the pond, so save yourself the duty expense and hassle of importing and grab this one while you can. Located near Hollywood. Cash on collection, no offers but will consider trades. FULL SPECIFICATIONS: SCALE LENGTH: 25 inches NECK & BODY: neck through body construction, solid mahogany PICKUPS: two Asher humbuckers PICKUP SWITCHING: three-way toggle CONTROLS: master volume and master tone STRING SPACING: nut: 1 7/8 ", bridge: 2 1/4" FRET BOARD: Genuine High Grade Rosewood BRIDGE: USA Asher Hipshot custom bridge NUT: Micarta FINISH: Tobacco Burst CASE: gig bag FRET LINES: 22 STRINGS: Asher Electro Hawaiian ® Lap Steel Strings Upgrades available only from Asher Guitars
Title: Asher Electro Hawaiian Guitar - Solid Mahogany Square Neck Through, Humbuckers
